markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Combat Duels](/Rules.aspx?ID=1252)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 166</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Unlike the other subsystems in this chapter, a combat duel works almost the same as a normal combat encounter, with a few exceptions. These rules require exceptional focus between two duelists and a third-party arbiter, and thus are not available in a normal combat.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-1253" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1254" />
name: Combat Duels

text: Combat Duels Source Gamemastery Guide pg. 166 Unlike the other subsystems in this chapter, a combat duel works almost the same as a normal combat encounter, with a few exceptions. These rules require exceptional focus between two duelists and a third-party arbiter, and thus are not available in a normal combat.
